description: Amendment adds language to provide that a broadcast license cannot be revoked or license renewal rejected until all appeals have been heard; and adds language to the section of the bill listing the required contents of the annual report of the Federal Communications Commission.
purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House report 108-436 to add language to preserve a licensee's right to appeal a violation or fine before it could be considered during a license application or renewal proceeding or used in a revocation proceeding initiated under the bill's "three strikes" provision.
